casebody.data:
James Leslie JAVUREK
v.
Sharon Dunigan JUMPER. No. 185P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. James Leslie Javurek, Pro Se. Edward S. Shapack, Charlotte, for Jumper.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 21st day of April 2004 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
